description:
Kazuya takes Kiriha and Kokuri grocery shopping, and then Shirou finds his charisma boosted to uncontrollable levels by a cologne amasogi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Certain Day in the Kagami Household / The Super Popular Fragrance
Aru Hi no Kagami-ke / Motemote Frangrance
Une journée chez les Kagami / Un parfum attirant
ある日の加賀見家 / モテモテフレグランス
